subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: If only Bud Selig, a self-proclaimed student of history, had given the nod to George W. Bush to become baseball commissioner in the mid-90s, he could have altered the course of recent history.
snippet: If only Bud Selig, a self-proclaimed student of history, had given the nod to George W. Bush to become baseball commissioner in the mid-90s, he could have altered the course of recent history.
